intro: Pultenaea altissima, commonly known as the tall pultenaea, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Rutaceae and is characterized by its slender, erect shrub form. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are narrow and opposite, often with a slightly hairy texture. Pultenaea altissima is typically found in sandy or gravelly soils in open habitats.
